Name: Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner
Additional Ability: Banquet of Perfection
Descriptions: When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Increases the duration of <color=#2eb6ff>Shock</color> inflicted on enemies by any character by 3s. When <color=#2eb6ff>Shocked</color> enemies are on the field, all squad members' <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color> increases by 10%.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <color=#2BAD00>7.5%</color>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

Increases the duration of <color=#2eb6ff>Shock</color> inflicted on enemies by any character by 3s. When <color=#2eb6ff>Shocked</color> enemies are on the field, all squad members' <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color> increases by 10%.

Cons.Name: Dance Duet
Cons.Effect:
After being sent out to launch an attack, Drusilla and Anastella stay in place for an additional 5.5s before returning to Rina.
The effect gained from <color=#ffffff>Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner</color> by characters within 10m is increased to 130% of the original value.

Cons.Name: Master's Paragon
Cons.Effect: Upon entering combat or switching in, Rina's DMG increases by 15% for 12s. This effect can trigger once every 18s.

Cons.Name: Needle and Hammer
Cons.Effect: Rina's Energy Regen increases by 0.5/s when both Drusilla and Anastella are deployed. The effect ends when Drusilla or Anastella returns to Rina.

Cons.Name: Stormy Night's Fright
Cons.Effect: When an <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the entire squad's <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color> is increased by 15% for 8s.
